## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 40,000                                  |
| Rationale                         | This order size covers the forecasted demand with a buffer, allows for variability in sales, and takes advantage of multiple vendor order quantities for optimal stock replenishment. |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | 0 units higher than the player's planned order. This ensures a safety net to handle potential demand fluctuations. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | 2 days                                     |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | 5 days                                     |
| Comments                          | Utilizing multiple vendor order quantities (40,000) allows for a more precise stock replenishment while minimizing excess inventory. |
